headlines.headline: Why Stephen A. 'didn't mind' Pistons-Hornets brawl
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith explains why he doesn't have much of an issue with the brawl between the Pistons and the Hornets that saw four players ejected.

headlines.headline: LeBron calls out Lakers: We're not a championship team
headlines.description: LeBron James says the Lakers aren't a championship team after their loss to Oklahoma City.

headlines.headline: Why Monica McNutt, Perk don't see Lakers as a serious playoff threat
headlines.description: Monica McNutt and Kendrick Perkins voice their concerns about the Lakers' chances of making an NBA Finals run.

headlines.headline: LeBron James calls out Lakers: We're not 'a championship team'
headlines.description: LeBron James says the Lakers are not a "championship team" after losing to the Thunder.

headlines.headline: Perk liked what he saw in Pistons-Hornets brawl: 'This is old school!'
headlines.description: Kendrick Perkins and Monica McNutt react to the brawl between the Pistons and Hornets on Tuesday night.

headlines.headline: Luka Doncic as a Laker: What we've seen a year in and what's next
headlines.description: Let's revisit the first 365 days of the Luka Doncic era in Los Angeles and examine how the Lakers can return to championship contention.

headlines.headline: Stephen A. on Sam Darnold: 'My doubts are gone'
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith gives his respect to Sam Darnold after helping the Seahawks to a Super Bowl win.

headlines.headline: What is the oldest NFL stadium? Soldier to SoFi in age
headlines.description: Many different characteristics make NFL stadiums unique. Age is a hot topic among fans. Here's how stadiums stack up from oldest to newest.

headlines.headline: Right move for Cowboys to franchise-tag George Pickens?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew discusses whether it is the right move for the Dallas Cowboys to place the franchise tag on George Pickens.

headlines.headline: Former Giants head coach Ray Handley dies at age 81
headlines.description: Former Giants head coach and Super Bowl-winning assistant Ray Handley died last week. He was 81.

headlines.headline: Will A.J. Brown still be with the Eagles next season?
headlines.description: Jeff Saturday and Dan Graziano debate whether A.J. Brown will still be playing for the Philadelphia Eagles next season.

headlines.headline: Should Darnold's success have the NFL rethinking QB development?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew discusses whether Sam Darnold's success should alter the way quarterbacks are developed.

headlines.headline: Which NHL players have the most goals at the Olympics?
headlines.description: As Olympic men's hockey looks ahead to 2026, past performances still shape the sport's legacy.

headlines.headline: Which NHL players are playing in 2026 Winter Olympics?

headlines.headline: What are the USA men's hockey team's chances for gold?

headlines.description: Get ready for more "NHL on ESPN" as teams make their final push for the playoffs.
